definition: to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology
old variant of 以[yi3]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
old variant of 以[yi3]
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
(bound form) fine/delicate
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Pay more attention to practical teaching to stimulate the students to learn for practice.
sentences.chinese: 重视实践性教学，激励学员学以致用。

sentences.english: Let this be your starting point to take what I have written about and apply it to your own forms.
sentences.chinese: 就让这里成为你学以致用的起点吧。

sentences.english: Pedants sneer at an education which is useful.
sentences.chinese: 迂腐之士讥笑学以致用的教育。

sentences.english: In their opinion, if college students work as a village official, they can't apply their professional knowledge that they learn in school.
sentences.chinese: 在他们觉得如果大学生做村官，他们不能学以致用。

sentences.english: Active learners are able to acquire new skills faster and put what they know to better use.
sentences.chinese: 积极学习者能够更快获得新技巧而且更好的学以致用。

sentences.english: This is a good chance to apply knowledge to practice.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个学以致用的好机会。

sentences.english: I think working in this company would give me the best chance to use what I‘ve learned in the university. As you may know from my resume, I majored in life science.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，在贵公司工作能给予我学以致用的最好机会。

sentences.english: We must adhere to the principle of making study serve the practical purpose.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须坚持学以致用的原则。

sentences.english: Helps us to look up the literature material simply, happen to studies for the purpose of application.
sentences.chinese: 干脆帮我们查文献资料吧，正好学以致用。

sentences.english: Can you apply your skill purposefully ?
Learning to use and using to learn is our pursues.
sentences.chinese: 学用结合，学以致用，是一个学子不懈的追求。

definition: to comprehend (new things) by analogy
when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
to immediately put into practice something one has just learned (idiom)
to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects)/to recall the past to understand the future
to follow good examples
to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects)/to recall the past to understand the future
to learn/to study
no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.
knowledge/CL:門|门[men2]/intellectual
to raise one and infer three/to deduce many things from one case (idiom)
to get a better grasp of sth
to make learning fun/to combine education and entertainment
to learn by rote/to mechanically memorize
give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime (idiom)
pinyin: shou4 zhi1 yi3 yu2 bu4 ru2 shou4 zhi1 yi3 yu2
related.word: 授之以鱼不如授之以渔
